description: Head of Rooster, zodiacal figure. Representing God of the Constellation Mao, grey earthenware with white ground, painted with flesh-coloured pigments. Daoist symbol for the Principle 'The Gentle; Wind' (sun) see cat. card for better description.
medium: Earthenware with white slip and traces of pigment
object_name: Rooster from Set of Zodiac Figures
title: Rooster from Set of Zodiac Figures
